channel.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
channel.description:
i keep finding guides on PUBLIC RSPS's i wanna make a RSPS but keep it private so i can test it and only i can use it but i cant seem 2 find how do that if u cud post links or anything wud be great im going to be using either demisePK or PKPLANET or PK MADNESS if i find any other good 1s ill be using them im just trying to geta good base and start Editing :D
THANKS!

item.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
item.dc:creator: @FWTV_Pain FWTV_Pain
item.description:
@FWTV_Pain wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:377156”][quote author=FWTV_Pain link=topic=473067.msg3459577#msg3459577 date=1294355059]
im using the Pk planet Client + source do i edit both to Local host?

im just basically trying to keep it private BUT without port forwarding and shit

Heres the link for the dl/view of the server

http://www.google.com/index.php?action=library&id=9
[/quote]

Facepalm You have to ethier portforward, or use hamachi, if you don’t pick one, it’s not going to work. Trust me.[/quote]

The PK planet release is working fine for me? im not port forwarding on it yet im on it ^^

Read full topic

item.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“FWTV_Pain, post:5, topic:377156”]im using the Pk planet Client + source do i edit both to Local host?

im just basically trying to keep it private BUT without port forwarding and shit

Heres the link for the dl/view of the server

http://www.google.com/index.php?action=library&id=9[/quote]

Facepalm You have to ethier portforward, or use hamachi, if you don’t pick one, it’s not going to work. Trust me.

Read full topic

item.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
item.dc:creator: @expozee expozee
item.description:
@expozee wrote:

are you using a webclient or a client? if web dont give out ur server ip, if client, dont change anything on gui.java

Read full topic

item.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Or if you want. Just do it local host ? U don’t need to portfoward that way
Just make ur ip on ur client “127.0.0.1” or “localhost” or “0.0.0.0”

Read full topic

item.title: PRIVATE RSPS help please
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Just portforward and don’t give out your server ip OR! You could just portforward on another port such as 5000; And use that for “private” testing.

Read full topic
